answers.answer: Sprite is safe, but you definitely don't wanna drink too much of it bc it is still high in sugar and you have to watch your sugar levels while pregnant so you don't get gestational diabetes. Try to drink at least 8 8oz glasses of water or more a day to keep things balanced.
Sprite is fine. The main reason you stop drinking the others are because of the caffeine in them but sprite is luckily caffeine free.

question: Is it safe to drink sprit when pregnant? I use to drink a lot of caffeine. And now i stopped drinkink coke,coffee,pepsi. But is sprite safe?
title: sprite?
